data.message: The world is aware that your Coca-Cola is impressive, but what would be really be impressive is making your bottles recyclable also. Come on, a company as large as yours can surely make the world A BETTER AND SAFER PLACE. Please help! Show us all what you can achieve. Many Thanks!

replies.message: Hi Doreen, thanks for getting in touch. We’re proud to say that all of our bottles and cans in Great Britain are 100% recyclable and have been since 2012. This means that all our drinks packaging can be recycled at home or when you’re out and about. However, we understand there is always more that can be done and we’ve embarked on a major review of our sustainable packaging strategy.  To keep up to date with all of our future sustainability announcements please visit www.coca-cola.co.uk/sustainability-section
